page.title: 05Shops
page.content: Aroras ======= Aroras have 11 employees. Two to three hundred customers come every day. Thursday is the busiest day of the week. They sell every kind of food. People mainly come for food they have run out of. Superchoice ============ Lorraine Edmonds is one of the two employees at Superchoice. They sell videos, clothes, sweets and batteries. They get on average 15 customers a day. There is a pool table and video machines. They are open from 12.30 to 6.30 except on Sundays. Fruitier and Food ================== Mr and Mrs Mistry run the shop in Newbold.There are 2 employees and they get 10 customers a day.
